article.name: Colouful Spiral (live)
article.description:
This afternoon I put it to myself to rebuild an applet from scratch based off a picture I made a while a go (and posted on this site) - Colourful Spiral. So, sort of in its honour I made a live version that you can play around with on the web.
Instructions: - Buttons 1-5 change the drawing style - \'i\' alternates drawing inwards, or outwards. - \'s\' enabled/disables smoothing. Smoothing looks better. - + and - increase and decrease the detail. Try reducing it down to the minimum. - \'f\' tabs between fill+stroke mode, fill only mode and stroke only mode.
I also made some pre rendered samples: (mediumColourfulSpirals.png)
